channel.title: Open Topic (new threads)
channel.description: Threads in the forum category "Open Topic" - Discuss anything!

item.title: Exploring Eberron and Homebrew Races
item.description: Thoughts potentially on adding the homebrew races from Keith Baker's Exploring Eberron or other homebrew races
item.content:encoded: Heyo, I was recently looking through the Exploring Eberron book, and I know that the homebrew subclasses are added onto here, but I was wondering if there would be a chance to add the homebrew races as well? Such as the Gnoll, and extra subraces for Aasimar and etc. It would be cool to see them on here, but i understand if not. Thanks for y'all time!

item.title: Equipment and Items
item.content:encoded: Hello, new user here love how usefully this page is. I was wondering if tables and descriptions will be added for equipment. For example some classes start with a "dungeoneer’s pack", but there's no table or description about what's in that pack. Sure it's easy to google, but just wondering if that'll be something to get added?

item.title: Heroes of Krynn Revisited UA
item.content:encoded:
This new UA is basically revising elements from the last one. I'll be combing through it over the next few days, either making updates to current pages or making new ones if the changes are significant enough. I'll post any new pages or note any changes here.

Kender (Revised) - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/kender-ua-revised

item.title: Lineage Pages for MMotM
item.description: making pages and getting everything linked to the main page
item.content:encoded:
I've recently gotten access to the MMotM book and have been trying to figure out how to incorporate its entries based on earlier discussions. I've been using Fredbob's lineage page on the test page (linked here) and begun working on making new lineage pages for MMotM. I'll try to update my progress as I go, but hopefully it can be a template for others with the book who want to add other entries (and maybe even incorporating the lineage structure into the main page).

Lineage Link (if complete)
Aarakocra http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/lineage:aarakocra-mmotm
Aasimar http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/lineage:aasimar-mmotm

item.title: Correction at the Summon Celestial page
item.content:encoded: At the Summon Celestial page, at the Celestial Spirit stat block, at the AC tab, it should be added "+2 (Defender only)" according to page 110 of Tasha's Cauldron of Everything" book.

item.title: Call to all Rules lawyers and contract specialist
item.description: I need help creating a contract with a demon Lord
item.content:encoded:
A call to all Rules lawyers and contract specialists I need help￼

So I’m in a campaign￼ with a soul collecting demon lord, whose primary goal is to collect the souls of the entire party. he already has two￼ and set up my character for a slow burn mid to late campaign collection should I give in.￼ Now I play an aasimar ￼ corrupted by a vampire bite so technically fallen but not if you know what I mean (protector Aasimar damphier hybrid)(Domain of￼ blood cleric rogue assassin) ￼￼ basically a justicar(definitely didn’t spell that right)￼ /temple assassin in-service to the goddess of war soldiers and Justice. ￼and this demon lord is a contract specialist￼. Due to events in the campaign￼ Several of our party needed to disguise themselves due to a quest in which our party needed to enter a foreign country with a severe opposition to magic specifically they employ mage hunters￼￼ One of our tiefling‘s while in my presence requested this disguise from his patron a.k.a. the demon lord who we all know as shade now our tiefling did not specify the disguise other than to blend in and be able to swim so he’s patron utilizing my characters biggest weakness￼ Ultra cute fluffy things temporarily permanently￼ ￼(if he doesn’t fulfill the bargain he remains in this form( Collect the soul of the regent of the country we are headed to who is in league with one of the big bad cults And has escaped my goddess is justice￼￼) Transformed our Centaur tiefling Into a super cute fluffy female jackalope ￼ A.k.a. my characters perfect addiction ￼ so far this demon lord has only requested the souls of sinners and those who have escaped justice So in essence working within the confines of my goddesses (mandate￼? Can’t really think of a good word here) but I think you’ll get my meaning So what I’m asking is to gather my rules lawyers and contract specialists and help me create a situation in which I have a full proof contract ready for the temptation of sad demon lord because odds are He’s going to corrupt the party￼￼￼ And I’m trying to figure out a way to keep my soul my own and pure while still reaping the benefits￼ That he offers￼ My friends I set you this task￼ Do not fail me￼ For I wish to have my bunny girl cake and eat it too￼

And on a sidenote I can’t even kill this guy without violating my goddesses tenants￼￼

Now even should a party get together with a deity or somesuch to kill said demon lord he is “completely innocent of sin” and therefore I would be violating the tenants of my Goddess by killing him

item.title: Corrections
item.content:encoded:
Cause Fear - does not have Somatic components
Summon Fiend - Death Throes says "ire damage" instead "fire damage"
Conjure Lesser Demon - Title should be "Conjure Lesser Demon (UA)"

item.title: Aura of Vitality: Wrong classes
item.description: The spell Aura of Vitality should only be accessible to Paladins.
item.content:encoded:
The 3rd level spell Aura of Vitality should - according to other sites - only be accessible to Paladins, but is also listed for Clerics and Druids.

I hope this is the correct way of reporting mistakes like this. Otherwise feel free to educate me.

item.title: Auroboros: Coils of the Serpent
item.description: Should we include this content in the homebrew section?
item.content:encoded:
Figured I'd throw this out there, see what everyone thinks. See how this approach to including non-official content works.

I backed this Kickstarter a while ago, and they're getting ready to send digital copies of the content out this week. What does everyone think about including this? Raised about $1.2 million on Kickstarter, and based on a campaign run by Chris Metzen (former Blizzard employee who worked on Starcraft, WoW, etc.) back in the 80's and 90's.

Link to the Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/warchief/auroboros/description

Once I have a copy, I can share some of the content on here so people can get a better idea of the quality.

item.title: Why does some parts dont show on the main page?
item.content:encoded: I was looking for race and found fairy on this page but to my suprise the non ua isn't on the main page, i have to speciffically search it, do you know any reason to it?

item.title: Tal'Dorei Campaign Setting Reborn
item.description: The third Critical Role sourcebook came out
item.content:encoded: Heya, just wanted to know if the items and subclasses added in Tal'Dorei reborn would be put on the wiki in a near future. I'm aware that unlike the Explorer Guide to Wildemount, it isn't officialy licenced by WotC but I still believe it deserves a spot in the homebrew section.

item.title: Mordenkainen's Monsters of the Multiverse
item.content:encoded:
So as was pointed out to me recently, this book is now available, even if only in a bundle. Has anyone purchased it? I think most of the player options in it are reprints of the player races; I wonder if there are any changes vs. the existing versions from the various books.

If so, I think we want to keep the originals intact, and add in MMotM as additional options. What does everyone think?

item.title: No Siren race?
item.description: The Siren race from Planeshift: Ixalan is missing!!
item.content:encoded:
Hi! I was just looking through the Planeshift documents and noticed that the Siren wasn't on there!
Or, perhaps it is already on the site but isn't linked to from the front page?

item.title: Wrong URL on the Epic Boons page
item.description: Wrong URL for Thunderwave in the Boon of the Stormborn description
item.content:encoded: On the page for Epic Boons, the description for the Boon of the Stormborn has a link to the Thunderwave spell, but it's linking to the wrong page (thunderwave instead of spell:thunderwave)

item.title: Lycanthrope/Origins of the Beast
item.content:encoded: Currently my character is a Goliath, level 2 barbarian/level1 fighter with a background of Gladiator. If I choose to level up the barbarian to level 3 and go Path of the Beast, do I also choose one of the four Origins of the Beast and get the pro/cons that come with it? I ask as I am thinking of going Goliath Lycanthrope so I may add 1 to both Strength and Constitution. I currently have + 6 Athletics so losing Natural Athlete may not be a big deal.

item.title: Missing errata from the Conjuration Wizard page
item.content:encoded:
On the Conjuration Wizard page:
The object disappears after 1 hour, when you use this feature again, or if it takes any damage.

The Minor Conjuration feature (p.116) received an errata in 2018 that is missing from the wikidot page.
It should now read:
The object disappears after 1 hour, when you use this feature again, or if it takes or deals any damage.

I believe this was added to prevent abuse with Purple Worm poison and similar items.

item.title: Strixhaven: A Curriculum of Chaos
item.description: Content to be added from the newest release
item.content:encoded:
So I recently got the new Strixhaven book and so I'm going to be creating pages for all the new player-related content and posting the links here.

Owlin Race - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/owlin

item.title: New Lineage Pages
item.content:encoded:
So been working on this off and on for months. It's always bugged me that the races (from this point on called lineages) weren't actually in their own categories. And the whole set up I thought was kind of messy so thought I'd play around see if I could come up with something else.

http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/lineage

If you look at the coding on these, most of them use [[include]] statements and pull in from other pages specific to a given variant or release version. If there's only a single variant, then it's all just coded on the main page.

Curious what you all think of this set up. It won't make for a huge change to the main page, but gets them all in a category and should be a bit easier to handle if/when we start setting up book/setting specific pages like has been discussed in other threads.

item.title: Monsters?
item.description: Wondering if anyone could or will eventually work on adding a page with monsters stat blocks?
item.content:encoded: I've been wondering for some time if anyone will end up adding a page similar to the magic items page but with all the monsters stat blocks. Sorry if this is already a thread if it is I couldn't find it. I realize this is a big thing if anyone decides to add it so not expecting anything anytime soon if at all just wanted to ask.
